TEXT.TITLE: DRANETZ TECHNOLOGIES INC <DRAN> YEAR DEC 31 NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 46 cts vs 77 cts Qtly div six cts vs six cts prior Net 2,198,469 vs 3,635,565 Revs 23.1 mln vs 26.0 mln Note: 1986 net includes one-time charge of 249,000 dlrs or five cts a share from discontinuation of Boat Sentry and Lakontek products. Qtly div payable April 15 to shareholders of record March 24. Reuter
